overview: New Year Dash 2020 was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) event produced by New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW). It took place on January 6, 2020, one day after Wrestle Kingdom 14, which is generally considered to be NJPW's biggest show of the year. The event featured the retirement ceremony of Japanese wrestling legend Jushin Thunder Liger.
title: NJPW New Year Dash 2020
